metadata.title: Coordinate - HTTP API
metadata.description:
The /coordinate endpoints query for the network coordinates for nodes in the
local datacenter as well as Consul servers in the local datacenter and remote
datacenters.

outlineItems.title: Read LAN Coordinates for all nodes
Read LAN Coordinates for a node
Update LAN Coordinates for a node

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
